p.k: Short, Drama Peru (2017). Hrají: Gabriela Velásquez, Juan José Espinoza, Alejandra Guerra. Režie: Hernan Velit.
p.d: Miguel, a 27th young man, woke up one morning with the job of processing his death father intestate succession certificate. When he arrive to the registration office, the process and their public servers show him that the bureaucracy it seems like a joke, but isn't, putting him in a labyrinth of papers and windows.
